Title: Journal Page II
Text:
Day 16.

The pilgrimage chapel is nothing but another empty shell. The knights smashed windows and overturned altars, but not one sign of the relic has been found.

Renzo seems to have lost his wits, staring at the torches and babblingâ€”perhaps a result of the drowning earlier. We can't afford to wait for his recovery. Ennio wishes to keep him with us, but such sentiment would only slow us down.

Our cause allows no room for the weak. Now, a ruin lies to the west of this island. That shall be our next destination.

May we walk ever upon the righteous path.
